mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PIN( travel_id, pin_place_name, pin_place_url, pin_category_name, pin_address_name, pin_road_address_name, pin_category_group_code, pin_category_group_name, pin_x, pin_y, pin_content ) VALUES ( #{travelId}, #{placeName}, #{placeUrl}, #{categoryName}, #{addressName}, #{roadAddressName}, #{categoryGroupCode}, #{categoryGroupName}, #{x}, #{y}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.travel_id as travel_id, p.pin_id as pin_id, p.pin_place_name as pin_place_name, p.pin_place_url as pin_place_url, p.pin_category_name as pin_category_name, p.pin_address_name as pin_address_name, p.pin_road_address_name as in_road_address_name, p.pin_phone as pin_phone, p.pin_category_group_code as pin_category_group_code, p.pin_category_group_name as pin_category_group_name, p.pin_content as pin_content, p.pin_x as pin_x, p.pin_y as pin_y, i.image_id as image_id, i.image_encoded_base64 as image_encoded_base64 FROM PIN p, IMAGE i WHERE p.pin_id = i.pin_id AND p.travel_id = #{travelId}

SELECT p.travel_id as travel_id, p.pin_id as pin_id, p.pin_place_name as pin_place_name, p.pin_place_url as pin_place_url, p.pin_category_name as pin_category_name, p.pin_address_name as pin_address_name, p.pin_road_address_name as in_road_address_name, p.pin_phone as pin_phone, p.pin_category_group_code as pin_category_group_code, p.pin_category_group_name as pin_category_group_name, p.pin_content as pin_content, p.pin_x as pin_x, p.pin_y as pin_y, i.image_id as image_id, i.image_encoded_base64 as image_encoded_base64, t.tag_id as tag_id, t.tag_name as name FROM PIN p, IMAGE i, Tag t WHERE p.pin_id = i.pin_id AND p.pin_id = t.pin_id AND t.tag_name IN
#{name}
